cells.data:
-- break :: (a -> Bool) -> [a] -> ([a], [a])
on break(p, xs)
	set bln to false
	tell mReturn(p)
		set lng to length of xs
		repeat with i from 1 to lng
			if |Î»|(item i of xs) then
				set bln to true
				exit repeat
			end if
		end repeat
	end tell
	if bln then
		if i > 1 then
			Tuple(items 1 thru (i - 1) of xs, items i thru -1 of xs)
		else
			Tuple({}, xs)
		end if
	else
		Tuple(xs, {})
	end if
end break
